text:
Hey!
I think I have not thanked you enough for everything you have been to me and done for me. Thanks for being my support for all these years, thanks for being there when even I didn't know I needed someone, Thanks for caring for me like a mom, teaching me like an elder sis, and always being there for me as my bestie. I have never expressed how grateful I am to have you, as I have always feared it'll jinx our relationship (not saying it friendship cause we are much more than that). But could not control it anymore with all the nostalgia trip xD. 
I think you are one of the very few people who has seen me crying my heart out, having a breakdown and not just been there for me but helped me recollect myself and stand strong again. 
Thanks for tolerating me all these years when at times I wondered how could someone bear with me. 
Love you a lot! 
P.S. I don't wanna jinx it by saying any forever wala stuff ğŸ˜¬
